definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

pinyin: shu4 zi4 yong4 hu4 xian4 lu4

sentences.english: Bus routes and railways, both overground and underground, converged on the station.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽車線路和地上地下路軌都在該站交匯。

sentences.english: The technology of line reinforced by the temporary beam in the D pattern and container bridge jacking has been widely applied.
sentences.chinese: 型便梁加固線路頂進箱橋施工技術已得到廣泛應用。

sentences.english: The scout with shoulder-straps shouted on the outermost route as a routine.
sentences.chinese: 戴肩章的偵查員按例在最核心的線路上叫嚷。

sentences.english: The Dickey County project is outside the cranes' normal migratory flight path.
sentences.chinese: 美洲鶴正常遷徙飛行線路沒有經過迪基縣的項目。

sentences.english: Double circuit transmission line is widely adopted in China owing to the demand of large-capacity power transmission.
sentences.chinese: 由於大容量輸電的需要，雙回線路在國內廣泛採用。

sentences.english: But, seen from another point of view, this line could be something very mysterious.
sentences.chinese: 但是，從另一個觀點來看，這線路可能是非常神祕的。

sentences.english: Our line seems to have got cross with someone else 's.
sentences.chinese: 好像我們的線路跟別人的串線了。

sentences.english: Humidity, and all kinds of liquids or moisture will erode electronic wires.
sentences.chinese: 溼氣和各種液體或水分都會腐蝕電子線路。

sentences.english: For the HVDC power transmission project from the Three Gorges Hydropower Station to Guangdong an appropriate ice-melting countermeasure should be considered.
sentences.chinese: 三廣直流工程的直流線路必須考慮合適的防冰對策。

sentences.english: If the super bus went into service, there would be no set routes or schedules.
sentences.chinese: 如果該巴士投入使用，可能沒有固定線路或時間表。

sentences.english: Aluminum-twisted is suitable for the common overhead power lines with the smaller distance and less force.
sentences.chinese: 鋁絞線適用於受力不大，檔距較小的一般配電線路。

sentences.english: Incredible as it seems, live high voltage transmission lines can be worked barehanded.
sentences.chinese: 令人難以置信的，帶電高壓輸電線路可以赤手操作。

sentences.english: That postman is in charge of this route.
sentences.chinese: 那個郵遞員負責這條投遞線路。

sentences.english: Liujiaxia to Shaanxi Province in cross-border 330 kilovolt transformer lines and over.
sentences.chinese: 劉家峽至陝西關中330千伏變電線路跨境而過。

sentences.english: Fully digital line switching and MCU controlled service reset timing.
sentences.chinese: 全數字化線路開關和單片機控制服務復位時間。

sentences.english: They were allowed to sell lossmaking lines to new short-haul railroads.
sentences.chinese: 他們可以自由出售虧損線路給短途鐵路運輸公司。

definition: itinerary/route/political line (e.g. right revisionist road)/CL:條|条[tiao2]
along the line (e.g. railway)/the region near the line
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
